songs.title: Bad Romance - The Cure ( ACT VI)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh *poses*
Caught in a bad rcmance
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Caught in a bad rcmance
LETS DANCE !
Ah-ah-ah, Roma Roma-ma, Gaga, "Oh la-la", want your bad rcmance
Ra-ra-ah-ah-ah, Roma Roma-ma, Gaga, "Oh la-la", want your bad rcmance

[Verse 1]
I want your ugly, I want your disease
I want your everything as long as it’s free
I want your lcve, lcve, lcve, lcve, I want your lcve
I want your drama, the touch of your hand
I want your leather-studded kc in the sand
I want your lcve
Lcve, lcve, lcve, I want your lcve

[Pre-Chorus]
Paws up, C'mon ! You know that I want you
And you know that I need you
I want it bad
Your bad NOW SING IT NOW JUMP !

[Chorus]
I want your lcve, and I want your revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
I want your love, and all your lcver's revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Caught in a bad rcmance
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Caught in a bad rcmance

[Post-Chorus]
Ra-ra-ah-ah-ah, Roma Roma-ma, Gaga, "Oh la-la", want your bad rcmance

[Verse 2]
I want your horror, I want your design
'Cause you’re a criminal as long as you’re mine
I want your lcve, lcve, lcve, lcve, I want your lcve
I want your psycho, your vertigo shtick!
Want you in my rear window, bcby, it's sick
I want your lcve, lcve, lcve, lcve, I want your lcve

[Pre-Chorus]
You know that I want you
And you know that I need you -'cause I'm a free chick, bcby
I want it bad
EVERYBODY LETS GO !

[Chorus]
I want your lcve, and I want your revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
I want your love, and all your lcver's revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Caught in a bad rcmance
*dances*
Caught in a bad rcmance

[Post-Chorus]
Gaga, "Oh la-la"

[Bridge 1]
Walk, walk, fashion, baby, Work it, move that chicks crazy
Walk, walk, fashion, baby, Work it, move that chick crazy
Walk, walk, fashion, baby, Work it, move that chick crazy
Walk, walk, fashion, baby, Work it, i'm a free chick, bcby


[Bridge 2]
You got one more chance Roblox, LET ME HEAR YOU SCREAM ! *dances*
I don't wanna be friends
Want your bad rcmance
Want your bad rcmance

[Chorus]
I want your lcve, and I want your revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
I want your love, and all your lcver's revenge
You and me could write a bad rcmance
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Caught in a bad rcmance
*dances*
Caught in a bad rcmance

[Outro]
Want your bad rcmance !
Want your bad rcmance ! *jump*
Want your bad rcmance.. Yeh !

Ra-ra-ah-ah-ah, Roma Roma-ma, Gaga, "Oh la-la", want your bad rcmance. *poses*

-The cure-

You know what is extra beautiful about having fans like you?
Is that I have watched you carry a message of love around the world for a very long time
Thank you so much for doing that, because, it spreads such good things and it makes you so extra special and different
So when, when we can’t find the cure, right? *smiles*
I know that you’re gonna fix some with your love. *smiles*

*waves* cmon everybody, lets go

[Verse 1]
I'll und* you 'cause you're tired
Cover you as you desire
When you fall asleep inside my arms
May not have the fancy things
But I'll give you everything
You could ever want, it's in my arms

[Pre-Chorus]
So baby tell me yes
And I will give you everything
So baby tell me yes
And I will be all yours tonight
So baby tell me yes
And I will give you everything
I will be right by your side!

[Chorus]
If I can't find the cure, I'll!
I'll fix you with my love
No matter what you know, I'll!
I'll fix you with my love
And if you say you're okay
I'm gonna heal you anyway
Promise I'll always be there
Promise I'll be the cure

[Verse 2]
Rub your feet, your hands, your legs
Let me take care of it, bcbe
Close your eyes I'll sing your favorite song!
I wrote you this lullaby
Hush now baby, don't you cry
Anything you want could not be wrong!

[Pre-Chorus]
So baby tell me yes *point mic*
And I will give you everything
So baby tell me yes *point mic*
And I will be all yours tonight
So baby tell me yes *point mic*

[Chorus]
If I can't find the cure, I'll!
I'll fix you with my love
No matter what you know, I'll!
I'll fix you with my love
And if you say you're okay
I'm gonna heal you anyway
Promise I'll always be there
Promise I'll be the cure

[Bridge]
*point*

[Chorus]
If I can't find the cure, I'll
I'll fix you with my love
No matter what you know, I'll
I'll fix you with my love
And if you say you're okay
I'm gonna heal you anyway
Promise I'll always be there
Promise I'll be the cu-re !
Promise I'll be the cu-re !
OoOOoh!

[Outro]
I’ll fix you *points at fans* with my love! *smiles*
